entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few showers ending this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 early this evening. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers in the morning. A few rain showers and wet flurries beginning near noon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 early in the afternoon. High 9. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023
